'''
    Just run a ``pacman -Sy``, return a dict::

        {'<database name>': Bool}

    CLI Example:

    .. code-block:: bash

        salt '*' pkg.refresh_db

# Remove rtag file to keep multiple refreshes from happening in pkg states

if root is not None:
        cmd.extend(('-r', root))
